title: Show uploaded image on Posters page

requirements.text: Add the user-uploaded image file `carry-2.png` to the frontend static assets and render it on the `/posters` route (PosterPage) so the Posters page is no longer empty and displays the uploaded poster image.
acceptanceCriteria: Visiting `/posters` renders a page (not `null`) that displays the `carry-2.png` image.
The image is served as a frontend static asset (not fetched from the backend) and loads on refresh without errors.
The image is displayed responsively (fits within viewport width, maintains aspect ratio) and has a non-empty English `alt` attribute.

constraints: Keep the existing `/posters` route in place (do not change routing).
Do not modify files under `frontend/src/components/ui` or other immutable paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
nonGoals: Implementing a persistent image upload system (file picker + backend storage) for end users.
Adding multi-image poster galleries, tagging, or admin management UI.
